Install Nextflow, a container or package management solution, and git¶

Hich’s dependencies may be installed already on your system. If not, here is what you need to install first before working with Hich.

  • Nextflow Install Nextflow

  • One of the following: Singularity, Docker, Conda, or Mamba. Nextflow’s other supported container solutions may work but have not been tested.

  • git is needed to clone Hich from GitHub.

Lumache
